QueryViewSpec.Name: Food Bank TX List Builder Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Returns transactions for each food bank. Used on the FoodBankWidgetDashboard.Page.xml. Page name Food Banks with ID of 753229b2-9549-41ce-8058-027e9b5e9230
QueryViewSpec.Author: Technical Training
QueryViewSpec.common:SecurityUIFolder: Constituent\Food Bank\Food Bank Transaction Header\Food Bank Transaction Detail

TVFImplementation.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_QUERY_FOODBANKTXDETAIL_LISTBUILDER(@FOODBANKID uniqueidentifier = null) returns table as return SELECT USR_FOODBANK.CONSTITUENTID AS FBCONSTITUENTID , USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER.ID as FOODBANKTXHEADERID , USR_FOODBANKTXDETAIL.ID as FOODBANKTXDETAILID , CONSTITUENT.NAME AS FBCONSTITUENTNAME --, USR_FOODBANK.FOODBANKTYPECODEID , USR_FOODBANKTYPECODE.DESCRIPTION AS FOODBANKTYPE , USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER.CONSTITUENTID AS TXCONSTITUENTID , CONSTITUENT_1.NAME AS TXCONSTITUENTNAME , USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER.FOODBANKTXTYPE , USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER.TXDATE , USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER.RECEIPTPRINTED , USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER.DATEADDED AS TXDATEADDED , USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER.DATECHANGED AS TXDATECHANGED --, USR_FOODBANKTXDETAIL.FOODITEMID , USR_FOODITEM.NAME as FOODITEMNAME
, USR_FOODBANKTXDETAIL.FOODITEMAMOUNT , USR_FOODBANKTXDETAIL.LINEAMOUNT , USR_FOODBANKTXDETAIL.QUANTITY , USR_FOODITEM.CURRENTCOST , USR_FOODITEM.LOWINVENTORYTHRESHOLD , USR_FOODITEM.WEIGHT FROM USR_FOODBANK INNER JOIN USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER ON USR_FOODBANK.ID = USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER.FOODBANKID INNER JOIN USR_FOODBANKTXDETAIL ON USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER.ID = USR_FOODBANKTXDETAIL.FOODBANKTXHEADERID INNER JOIN USR_FOODBANKTYPECODE ON USR_FOODBANK.FOODBANKTYPECODEID = USR_FOODBANKTYPECODE.ID INNER JOIN USR_FOODITEM ON USR_FOODBANKTXDETAIL.FOODITEMID = USR_FOODITEM.ID INNER JOIN CONSTITUENT ON USR_FOODBANK.CONSTITUENTID = CONSTITUENT.ID INNER JOIN CONSTITUENT AS CONSTITUENT_1 ON USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER.CONSTITUENTID = CONSTITUENT_1.ID WHERE (@FOODBANKID is null or USR_FOODBANK.CONSTITUENTID = @FOODBANKID);
